overview: As usual with Triga, this bunch of horny buggers are definitely up to no good! British blokes beating their meat and having a right old fuck around with their fit as fuck mates. Only Triga finds British Bad Lads like these. But be warned, they might cum a lot but they certainly do not come easy. We have done all the hard work for you, chatted the lads up, got 'em pissed and paid 'em some cash, and then served them up on a plate. Eight choice prime cuts of British meat featuring real British Bad Lads from local street style scallies, sports slags, horned-up squaddies, and fuckin' filthy decorators pasting up more than wallpaper up each other's arses! What more could you want?
title: British Bad Lads
